name: Hypnotic Suggestion
descrip: A magic that can be put people into a sleepy sensational state.
statusOutcome: {AttackerName} uses her slow movements and curvaceous body to get {TargetYouOrMonsterName} into a drowsy state.
statusMiss: {AttackerName} uses her slow movements and curvaceous body to get {TargetYouOrMonsterName} into a drowsy state. But {TargetName} prevails and {AttackerYouOrMonsterName} eye twitches as if {TargetName} had pressed a nerve!
